column4: Apple CEO's announcement he is gay prompts discomfort for someApple's Cook: 'I'm proud to be gay' Apple Inc  CEO Tim Cook on Thursday became the most prominent American corporate leader to come out as gay
column5: saying he was trading his closely guarded privacy for the chance to help move civil rights forward.  Apple's Cook: 'I'm proud to be gay' Apple Inc  CEO Tim Cook on Thursday became the most prominent American corporate leader to come out as gay
column6: saying he was trading his closely guarded privacy for the chance to help move civil rights forward. BIRMINGHAM Ala. Apple chief Tim Cook's announcement on Thursday that he is gay and wants to help further civil rights found strong support in some quarters
column7: but his advocacy met less enthusiasm among some people in Alabama
